ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups long-grain white rice, 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk, 1   +   1/4 cups water, 1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste, 1 tablespoon shredded coconut, or to taste (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 22g 28%, Saturated Fat 19g 95%, Sodium 22mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 60g 22%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 1mg 5%, Calcium 39mg 3%, Iron 6mg 34%, Potassium 300mg 6%
